description: Bottle Filler at Ballymoney Gorey Leaking. On site attendance wiring connection was lose and battery had been drained. Installed 1 month.

description: SRK103 Ped connection holes drilled for M20 not M24 as required by drawing. Issue found by Intel at Ped installation in Fab.
1: SRK103 Ped connection holes drilled for M20 not M24 as required by drawing. Issue found by Intel at Ped installation in Fab.

description:
Report from Keith Kelly on Site
Dunnes Store manager reported leaking issue through the roof onto the TOMRA (recycling machine).  This machine needs to be protected from the elements so has to be powered down.
Weld broken in 1 no. location.  Also uncleaned spatter on the roof support.
Enclosure foundation has a fall which means the roof is flat & water is ponding.
1:
Report from Keith Kelly on Site
Dunnes Store manager reported leaking issue through the roof onto the TOMRA (recycling machine).  This machine needs to be protected from the elements so has to be powered down.
Weld broken in 1 no. location.  Also uncleaned spatter on the roof support.

description:
TOMRA (Reverse Vending Machine Supplier) report via Dunnes Stores
As discussed on the phone yesterday we received a callout from Dunnes Irishtown as they reported their printer was not working and full of water. Our technician has arrived at site today and found the housing is badly leaking. TOMRA have left the machines powered off as a safety precaution. 

There is a risk that these machines are completely damaged and will need either full replacement or multiple components replaced. Once housing is repaired we can return to site to do an assessment of machines and will report any damage to you.
1:

description: We only supplied 48no. Single Brackets, despite 90no. being quoted and invoiced.
1: We only supplied 48no. Single Brackets, despite 90no. being quoted and invoiced.

description: One of the hatches on the scum baffle has came off with the wind on Tank C in Ringsend. The hatch has broken off from the piano hinge. This will need to be replaced
